Pre-Game Insights: Belarus have gone four consecutive games without a win, losing three and claiming one draw while conceding 10 goals and failing to find the back of the net since beating Kosovo 1-0 in the European Championship qualifiers back in November 2023.
Bulgaria have now gone six straight matches without defeat across all competitions, picking up one win and five draws since a 2-0 friendly defeat against Albania in October 2024.
Others: Belarus and Bulgaria square off in the 2024 UEFA Nations League on Thursday

Bulgaria, who are currently 99th in the latest FIFA World Rankings, get their Nations League campaign underway, where they will battle Bulgaria, Luxembourg, and Northern Ireland in Group 3 of League C.
